message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $7,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product that is worth $8,000, allowing you to save $500 upfront. I trust this offer will be attractive to you, considering the significant benefits the product can provide. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed.
